description: The OR_CASE_BLOCKS table contains OR management system case scheduling blocks.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the scheduling block information for the case.

columns.name: SERVICE_BLOCK_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value which indicates the service type for the case.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
